tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task
tasks.description: Plan A below shows the ground floor of a particular art gallery in 2005. Plan B shows the same area in the present day.

images.altText: Plan A showing art gallery ground floor in 2005
Plan B showing art gallery ground floor in present day

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: In many countries, people like to eat a wider variety of food than can be grown in their local area. As a result, much of the food people eat today has to come from other regions. Do you think the advantages of this development outweigh disadvantages?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
